review_blob: Not bad aroma. Pours good head but taste is watery with fairly strong bitter finish. Not bad but a bit too watery
Pours good head which fades slowly. Slightly sweet very faint aroma, refreshing watery taste with lasting bitter finish. Good with a curry
Another aldi special. 89p so I wasnt expecting much but pleasantly surprised. Couldnt get much aroma, very faint burnt malt smell. Good bittersweet malty hit which fades. For 89p Im not complaining
Another purchase from aldi. Good beer from badger brewery will definitely get some more. Pours with a nice head, fruity aroma taste slightly watery, zesty malt finish
Working my way through the aldi ale section. This has been the best yet. Couldnt get much aroma from it, good fruity flavour with a bitter finish. Pretty good one from Marston.
Quite bland. Not much head, watery bitter notes. Disappointing! The aroma is probably the best thing about the beer but the taste disappoints.
Its poor. Got fooled by the lowestein name and thought Id have a punt on it. Its watery, pretty tasteless pish, as youd expect from a saint omer
